meanings.definition: A compound containing iodine combined with another element or group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied various iodids in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Iodids are commonly used in medical treatments.
meanings.sent3: The iodids in the mixture decided to throw a party in the test tube.
meanings.sent4: The bond between iodine and the other element in the iodids was as strong as a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The bright color of the iodids made them stand out in the solution.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacist dispensed iodids to the patient.
meanings.sent2: Hydriodic acid forms iodids when combined with other substances.
meanings.sent3: The iodids in the bottle whispered jokes to each other.
meanings.sent4: The iodids acted like tiny sponges, absorbing all the surrounding liquid.
meanings.sent5: The smell of iodids filled the room, overpowering all other scents.
